Title: Ask Us Anything: Michael and Megan Answer Your Questions
Description:
Leaders make decisions, but clarity can be hard to come by. In this episode, listeners fire their most pressing questions at Michael and Megan. They bring practical solutions to the problems many leaders face, based on more than 30 years of business experience.

You will:

  • Learn how to push back on coworker demands.
  • Understand the three most important tools for bouncing back from a setback.
  • Find out how to influence workplace culture—even when your boss is not onboard.
  • Gain the confidence to surrender control of tasks to an administrative assistant.
  • Get practical advice for balancing business demands with a growing family.
  • Learn how to lead a meeting with people who don’t want to be there.
